system.description: Effect: All valid targets are pushed away from the user. If all valid targets collide with Blocking Terrain or another creature, they take 1/8 of their Max HP as Typeless damage. If all valid targets are knocked off a ledge and fall at least 1m, they take 1/8 of their Max HP as Typeless damage as well as any applicable fall damage.

actions.name: Dragon Tail
actions.description: Effect: All valid targets are pushed away from the user. If all valid targets collide with Blocking Terrain or another creature, they take 1/8 of their Max HP as Typeless damage. If all valid targets are knocked off a ledge and fall at least 1m, they take 1/8 of their Max HP as Typeless damage as well as any applicable fall damage.
